Land.title: Sky Ring
Land.description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

Land.title: Mission Interstellar
Land.description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

Land.title: G Fall
Land.description: Brace yourself for a heart-pounding, high-speed plunge into a dizzying freefall!

Land.title: Wonderla Bamba
Land.description: Perfect for first time thrill-seekers, this takes you on a spin with sudden drops and bursts of speed that will leave you wanting more!

Land.title: Space Gun
Land.description: See the world upside-down, dangling from high up above the ground!

Land.title: Recoil
Land.description: India’s first-ever action-packed reverse looping roller coaster ride!

Land.title: Hyperverse
Land.description: Get transported to another world as you soar through a breathtaking 3D metaverse!

Land.title: Equinox
Land.description: A thrill monster that flips you around 360 degrees in a gravity-defying spin.

Land.title: Air Race
Land.description: An exhilarating flight simulation with banks, loops and dives.

Land.title: Y-Scream
Land.description: Strap in tight to swing, spin and scream on this dizzying 360-degree thrill fest!

Water.title: Water Pendulum
Water.description: Hold on tight as you glide up and down on a water tube across a U-shaped slide!

Water.title: Drop Loop
Water.description: Slide down a sky-high slope, twist through a loop and make a splashy exit!

Water.title: Sea Lagoon
Water.description: Get soaked, splashed and sprayed in this thrilling pool paradise!

Water.title: Wave Pool
Water.description: Experience the bliss of waves washing over you, far away from the sea.

Water.title: Korneto
Water.description: Slide, swirl and splash through a whirling vortex on this slippery ride!

Water.title: Bullet
Water.description: Navigate through twists, tunnels and loops on 3 epic water slides!

Water.title: Screw
Water.description: Get ready to rush through dizzying turns and loops at mind-blowing speeds!

Water.title: Drop & Tornado
Water.description: Zoom down through a twisty maze of 4 thrilling tunnels into a splashy escape!

Water.title: Water Falls
Water.description: Get drenched under a cascading waterfall with steep rocks.

Water.title: Harakiri
Water.description: Rush down, take a breather, and slide back down to the finish for pure, non-stop thrill!

Kids.title: Happy Kangaroo
Kids.description: Plummet into a safe freefall with a tall & cheerful kangaroo!

Kids.title: Mini Coco Cup
Kids.description: Spin around in a gigantic cup placed on a rotating turntable floor!

Kids.title: Carousel
Kids.description: Gallop around on colourful horses like a seasoned cowboy!

Kids.title: Crazy Cars
Kids.description: Dash and crash into your friends’ cars in your very own Formula 1 circuit!

Kids.title: Pony Train
Kids.description: Hop onto a chariot-pulled pony ride through the world of fantasy!

Kids.title: Kiddies Wheel
Kids.description: A miniature giant wheel designed to give your children a taste of real thrill without being half as scary.

Kids.title: Funky Monkey
Kids.description: Plummet into a safe freefall with a tall & playful monkey!

Kids.title: Jack-O-Coaster
Kids.description: Ride on the edge with sharp curves, steep climbs and dizzying drops!

Kids.title: Mini Pirate Ship
Kids.description: Sail like a pirate on a miniature, adrenaline-filled flying boat!

Kids.title: Jumping Frog
Kids.description: Hop on a frog and leap into ribbiting fun as you spin around!
